item.title: Apply for access to a GWS
item.description: This article explains how to apply for access to a GWS from the JASMIN account portal. Step 1 : Sign in into your JASMIN accounts portal.

item.title: Approving requests for access roles
item.description: Managers of JASMIN resources will also be set up to approve applications from members of the JASMIN user community wishing to use particular resources.
